The Quranic researcher said to him: It is a single mound that is an illusion of an estimated estimated by their denominations; For when his orbit was the disturbance of them, he was restored to them.But it is a single shout, that is, a one -sauger, and it is the second blow, expressing it to it, as a warning of it as the hopes of its connection to it as if it was the one who is in it.
